text: Tensions rise as Ukraine defends itself against Russia's energy sector attacks. In a world where human rights & justice matter, why should Ukrainian refineries be the sole targets? Rep. Austin Scott (R-Ga.) raises a valid point - if Russia targets Ukraine's energy sector, shouldn't Ukraine have the right to defend itself? The US must support Ukraine's self-defense & address air defense resource disparities between Kyiv & the West. Let's champion peace, justice, and fairness for all!" 💡🌍⚖️
